name: Workforce Program
description: FACES SF Visitacion Valley Neighborhood Access Point assists San Franciscans and Bay Area residents ages 18 to 50 who are low-income, single parents, or high school graduates with little work experience in acquiring the skills they need to enter the workforce or advance their careers by providing the following services in English, Spanish, Mandarin and Cantonese: - Orientation and Assessment - Referral Social Services (childcare, housing, etc.) - Career Advising - Job Readiness Training (resume
